entry.source: {F812}Cheerful man\0{F87A,60}Back in the day, there was a string{F801}of child kidnappings.{F801}{F802}At the time, the police hid the{F801}truth, but the victims' families all{F801}knew what was happening.{F801}

entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-421}{F813,1,411101}Humans have such pitiful minds.{F801}All this crap about "hope"...{F801}{F802}Don't they realize that it doesn't{F801}change the fact that they're all{F801}going to be eaten by us?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Grimy woman\0{F87A,66}{F813,1,403312}I was sent here because my husband{F801}comes from a farming family.{F801}{F802}I was happy to see him get eaten by{F801}a demon... but now I'm glad that I{F801}married that jerk.{F801}{F802}I won't be attacked by demons out{F801}here, and I can eat a scrap of{F801}vegetables once in a while...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Grimy woman\0{F87A,66}{F813,1,403312}I was sent here because my husband{F801}comes from a farming family.{F801}{F802}I was happy to see him get eaten by{F801}a demon... but now I'm glad that I{F801}married that jerk.{F801}{F802}I won't be attacked by demons out{F801}here, and I can eat a scrap of{F801}vegetables once in a while...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Grimy woman\0{F87A,66}{F813,1,403312}If the Ashura-kai were to go away,{F801}I might be free to leave this farm...{F801}{F802}But I don't have think I could{F801}survive in Tokyo if they're out of{F801}the city, too...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Grimy woman\0{F87A,66}{F813,1,403312}If the Ashura-kai were to go away,{F801}I might be free to leave this farm...{F801}{F802}But I don't have think I could{F801}survive in Tokyo if they're out of{F801}the city, too...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-423}{F813,1,412101}Ah, young one. May I borrow your{F801}hand for a moment?{F801}{F802}Hmm... Your palm has an obvious mark{F801}of death. It seems there is no escape{F801}from your fate.{F801}{F802}Trying to resist it will only prolong{F801}your suffering. ...I recommend that{F801}you calmly surrender to us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-423}{F813,1,412101}Ah, young one. May I borrow your{F801}hand for a moment?{F801}{F802}Hmm... Your palm has an obvious mark{F801}of death. It seems there is no escape{F801}from your fate.{F801}{F802}Trying to resist it will only prolong{F801}your suffering. ...I recommend that{F801}you calmly surrender to us.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-423}{F813,1,412101}...Having hope means resisting us{F801}and prolonging one's suffering.{F801}{F802}The humans should toss their hope{F801}aside and calmly give in to their{F801}fates by surrendering to us.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-423}{F813,1,412101}...Having hope means resisting us{F801}and prolonging one's suffering.{F801}{F802}The humans should toss their hope{F801}aside and calmly give in to their{F801}fates by surrendering to us.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}{F813,1,403631}...Like I said before, these are the{F801}rules in Tokyo.{F801}{F802}Don't you wanna stay outta trouble in{F801}a strange land? You see my pocket open{F801}here, right...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}{F813,1,403631}...Like I said before, these are the{F801}rules in Tokyo.{F801}{F802}Don't you wanna stay outta trouble in{F801}a strange land? You see my pocket open{F801}here, right...?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The reluctant man silently stuffed{F801}some Macca into the accented man's{F801}pocket.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The reluctant man silently stuffed{F801}some Macca into the accented man's{F801}pocket.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}This makes you a resident of Tokyo, too.{F801}Here's hoping for a long... Hm?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}This makes you a resident of Tokyo, too.{F801}Here's hoping for a long... Hm?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}{F813,1,403621}Oh, the champion!? M-Man, you saw that?{F801}{F802}I-It was just a joke, y'know? These{F801}Mikado folks sure are simple and honest!{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Accented man\0{F87A,137}{F813,1,403621}Oh, the champion!? M-Man, you saw that?{F801}{F802}I-It was just a joke, y'know? These{F801}Mikado folks sure are simple and honest!{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The accented man handed the Macca back{F801}to the reluctant Samurai.{F801}
